website_summaries.verdict: A premium folding sideline bench that you can use for camping trips, concerts and other outdoor events.
pros: Provides a comfortable bench for up to 4 people
Each bench measures approximately 6 feet long
Fits perfectly into a car's trunk or hatch space
Sold with a handy carrying case
cons: Zipper on the carrying case tends to break easily

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS NOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't even know why I hadn't bought this sooner. We are a family of 5 and lugging around 5 chairs is not fun. This chair makes my life so much easier. It's simple yet efficient design allows you to fold it up like an accordion and put it in the bag it comes with and send you on your way in less than 2 minutes. Every time I fold or unfold this chair people ask me where I got it and how awesome it is. I have to agree. This is a great product. Definitely worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Condon

customer_reviews.title: Good but more for kiddos
customer_reviews.text: Great sports bench. Purchased because I have five kids and we need this just to watch sibling soccer games. Seems sturdy and not to heavy to haul around. It is perfect for the kiddos but is not really comfortable for larger adults. I had to sit in the end to be more comfortable. Has held up well through half a soccer season and I expect will last much longer. Would buy again when this is no longer usable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The girls love it. We only used it for half of ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bench for my Girls soccer team (U7). The girls love it. We only used it for half of the season, but it held up great. No quality concerns so far and the bag is easy to load and carry onto the field. Adding a bench to the sideline was a great way to help keep 7 year olds contained. Before the bench they would bounce around and spill onto the field cheering, but now they stay a little more contained. The 4-seater was good. We have 8 players and 4 on the field at once so it has been plenty.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for young athletes
customer_reviews.text: My husband started coaching our 6 year old's soccer team and we purchased this as our team bench. It's perfect for what we need and is easy to set up and take down. I thought it would be difficult to get it back into the carrying bag but we've had no issues,
customer_reviews.author: Theresa G

customer_reviews.title: Best money I’ve ever spent
customer_reviews.text: Beyond easy to set up and put away. So convenient. Only downside is there are no arm rests. But for myself and my husband and kids it is perfect!! In one fell swoop it is assembled and just as easily put back away!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect team bench
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sons soccer team. We have 8 kids on the team, so 4 seats was the perfect size. It comes in a convenient carry case that is easy to use. Not too heavy to carry and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Godsey3

customer_reviews.title: great with kids and events!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, compact when folded, and very functional. use it all the time when kids visit me. bought 2 of these chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Chun R.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love them. Just unzip the carrying bag and pull them out. They are great and we'll be getting more for family and sporting events.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian S

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: in love with this product, very light, support 4 adults with no problem
customer_reviews.author: Genezis

customer_reviews.title: Carrying bag is as important as seating
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, the carrying case came with a broken zipper and with a tear. I feel as though I received a previously owned product. The seat is comfortable, used it at a soccer game the very next day after receiving it, but awkward carrying without the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Donjeff

customer_reviews.title: Comfort in a bag
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and believe it or not they were so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: SHEILA MARIE  MORENO

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed that the zipper for the carrying case broke the ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that the zipper for the carrying case broke the first time we used it!! Otherwise, kids love the bench. We're using it for 7 year old boys and they say it's comfortable. I hope the bench is sturdier than the carrying case!
customer_reviews.author: DTL

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cot so I could sleep comfortably in a hospital room. I liked this because it is more useful to me. It enabled me to sleep much more comfortably as compared to the non-reclining chair in a hospital room. It is fairly lightweight and easy to carry in it's bag..
customer_reviews.author: cat

customer_reviews.title: Good seats, bag broke immediately
customer_reviews.text: The seat is great for us at football games. It's compact and lightweight to carry. The only problem was that the bag broke on the first use! But so far the seats are holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Burkman

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS BENCH!
customer_reviews.text: We love this bench! I got it for my Grandson's flag football team and it's perfect for them. Just the right size for the boys. It is smaller and closer to the ground so I think it's better for kids than for adults. The carrying case is useful and it folds up nicely. Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is so quick and easy to use. We have a bunch of young swimmers and take it to meets where seating is limited. Dries quickly, easy to open and close, great carrying bag too!
customer_reviews.author: SarahRJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for people who spend a lot of time at the park with kids!
customer_reviews.author: OZ4

customer_reviews.title: great quality and easy to transport to our team events
customer_reviews.text: great quality and easy to transport to our team events. bought for High School team and it easily/comfortably fits 4 large boys. no problems after 1 season of use. will definitely purchase again if we need any more
customer_reviews.author: Jackie C

customer_reviews.title: Great seat for the money
customer_reviews.text: This product is lightweight and is easy to unfold and fold back up again.
customer_reviews.author: JBK

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, easy to carry anywhere
customer_reviews.text: This chair is perfect for going places. You never know where you might go and there’s no seating. My children and I fit perfectly. Packaging is great. Easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Yadira Giron

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, looks great
customer_reviews.text: Add me to the fan base. Sturdy, looks great, lightweight - and the kids really appreciate a sideline chair with backs.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Ritter

customer_reviews.title: envy of the soccer field
customer_reviews.text: I have a feeling next soccer season people will be copying off of me! Everyone loves my bench seat and ask where I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Antonette K

customer_reviews.title: One Zipper on the bag broke the very first use ...
customer_reviews.text: One Zipper on the bag broke the very first use and later the other end of zipper broke. So the bag is poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Bag does not hold up, zippers break easily
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for soccer teams and both bag zippers broke within the first 2-3 uses of the benches.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Jeske

customer_reviews.title: Please last forever
customer_reviews.text: Easy to pack and unpack perfect for my lil ones when attending my older ones sporting events.
customer_reviews.author: clint

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Fold up nice. Perfect for young kids
customer_reviews.author: Steven Marler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great chair my grandkids love it at their soccer practice
customer_reviews.author: Monica M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bench!
customer_reviews.text: This bench is a must buy! We bought the blue 4 seater, color is as pictured. I have 6 children, and 2 of the boys play travel baseball. My husband works a lot and I am a smaller framed woman (5'5, 125#) and let me tell you this chair is fairly lightweight and easy to set up and take down! I am able to carry it myself while pushing a stroller, sets up in about 30 seconds, and folds accordion like and can be put away in about 45 seconds. It holds all of our weight, even my husband can sit on it (215 pounds) without any issue. Held up one summer and still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Bag
customer_reviews.text: We love the chair, now I won't here I wanna sit on that (one seater) chair and the kids love it. I could probably sleep on that it's so long. but the only thing is when I took it out of the box, the bag was ripped right across long ways. Is there any replacement bags?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Crown Sporting Goods 6-Foot Portable Folding 4 Seat Bench with Seat Backs & Carry Bag – Great Team Bench for Soccer & Football Sidelines, Tailgating, Camping & Events
feature_bullets: Comfortable & convenient: 4-person comfortable seating with convenient size and backrest
Versatile: this Sideline bench is perfect for outdoor events: sporting events, camping, and concerts
Take it anywhere: includes over the shoulder carrying bag, 30"x 16"x 6" when in bag and weighs about 16 lbs
Seats 4: each seat holds 220 lbs., and is about 6 feet long and 19.5 inch wide
No Assembly: pops up and breaks down in seconds, no tools Required
